evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, enhancing scalability and reliability.
GPW Psychiatry complies with HIPAA regulations ensuring data privacy and security for health information.
They offer FHIR-compliant APIs for health data interoperability.
The company supports X12 EDI transactions for health care claims processing.
Integration with Twilio for secure authentication solutions, providing MFA capabilities.

icp.icp_reason: They utilize HIPAA compliant X12 EDI transactions for healthcare data exchange.
